item.g:title: Discover the Joy of Poetry with Shel Silverstein's A Light in the Attic
item.g:description: A Light in the Attic is a delightful collection of poetry and illustrations by Shel Silverstein, perfect for sparking creativity and laughter in readers of all ages. This special 20th-anniversary edition is best for families looking to share whimsical stories, educators seeking engaging material for their classrooms, or anyone wanting to enjoy a nostalgic trip through imaginative verse.
